sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import {
  GridColumn,
  FormInput,
  FormGroup,
  FormCheckbox,
  Grid,
  Form,
  Pagination,
  Segment,
} from 'semantic-ui-react'

function AccountSettingsForm() {

    return (
      <Grid columns={1}>
        <GridColumn>
          <Pagination
            
          />
        </GridColumn>

        <GridColumn>
          <Form as={Segment}>
            <FormGroup widths={2}>
              <FormInput
                label='Email'
                name='activePage'
                min={1}
                
                type='number'
                
              />
              <FormInput
                label='Номер телефона'
                name='totalPages'
                min={1}
                
                type='number'
                
              />
            </FormGroup>
            <FormGroup widths={2}>
              <FormInput
                label='Пароль'
                name='boundaryRange'
                min={0}
                
                type='number'
                
              />
              <FormInput
                label='Повтор пароля'
                name='siblingRange'
                min={0}
                
                type='number'
                
              />
            </FormGroup>
            <FormGroup inline>
              <FormCheckbox
                
                label='Присылать уведомления на почту'
                name='showEllipsis'
                
              />
              <FormCheckbox
                
                label='Присылать уведомления в Telegram'
                name='showFirstAndLastNav'
                
              />
              <FormCheckbox
                
                label='Show previous and next nav pages'
                name='showPreviousAndNextNav'
                
              />
            </FormGroup>
          </Form>
        </GridColumn>
      </Grid>
    )
  }

export default AccountSettingsForm;
